docs.snippet: The company said hackers had stolen 57 million accounts and that the breach was kept secret. In the aftermath, it fired its top security executive.

headline.print_headline: Uber Breach, Kept Secret for a Year, Hit 57 Million Accounts
headline.main: Uber Hid 2016 Breach, Paying Hackers to Delete Stolen Data
